nodes.text: Toht Ra was a male Hylobon who served as member of Dryden Vos' security forces, working as an attendant aboard the First Light. Ra confiscated all weapons brought aboard the yacht by guests. He carried a percussive cannon and vibrocutlass in case of trouble.

In answering a fan question about whether or not Toht Ra's name derives from the Indiana Jones franchise, Phil Szostak noted that the character was named after Arnold Ernst Toht, the Gestapo agent from the 1981 film Raiders of the Lost Ark (written by Lawrence Kasdan) who burns his hand on the headpiece to the Staff of Ra, though he suspects that Lucasfilm Story Group's Pablo Hidalgo was most likely the one who came up with the name.
